name: Princess in the Tower Block [in development]
name_original: Princess in the Tower Block [in development]
description:
A Twine game about queer love in isolation.

Live your day-to-day life as a non-binary person in your apocalyptic tower block flat.  Take baths and make an altar and dream about a princess in a tower. Crush on the cutie who delivers you bread. Bring old stories into the present day, for better or for worse. Be surrounded by pink.

Troubleshooting notes:
If the game won't run, try turning off cookies in your browser.
If the text overlaps the images making it difficult to read, resize the window to be slightly narrower.

Please comment with your feedback- the game is still in development!
